178th anniversary of Independence of Brazil marked
articles.content:
178th anniversary of Independence of Brazil marked 
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A meeting to mark the 178th anniversary of the Independence of Brazil was held at the Pyongyang Embroidery Institute on Thursday.
   Attending the meeting were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Society for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the Korea-Brazil Friendship Association, members of the association and workers of the institute.
   The chairman of the association made a report, which was followed by speeches, at the meeting.    
   After the meeting the participants looked round publications introducing Brazil.

Co-chairmen of U.N. millennium summit issue statement
articles.content:
Co-chairmen of U.N. millennium summit issue statement 
    Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The co-chairmen of the U.N. millennium summit issued a statement on Wednesday, the first day of the summit, to applaud  the historic Pyongyang meeting held in June and the north-south joint declaration.
   The statement said:    
   The co-chairmen of the U.N. millennium summit hail the historical summit between the leaders of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Korea held in Pyongyang last June and the north-south joint declaration as a major breakthrough in bringing peace, stability and reunification to the Korean peninsula and encourage the two parties to advance the process of dialogue so that it may make a contribution to peace and security in the region and the world and thus eventually lead to the peaceful reunification of the peninsula.

Greetings to President of Tajikistan
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Tajikistan 
     Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- President Kim Yong Nam of the presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly sent a message of greetings to Emomali Rakhmonov, President of Tajikistan, on September 5 on the occasion of its National Day.
   The message extended warm congratulations to the President, the government and people of Tajikistan on the occasion of its National Day.    
   It wished the president and people of Tajikistan greater success in the work for national reconciliation and economic development and expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too.
